title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but do not have any effect.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled so that they cannot be moved since they do not have any effect.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved.
3. Verify that moving the scrollbars does not have any effect.
